description:
Dates are considered a good source of fiber, it is the fruit of dates palm tree which is grown in many tropical regions around the world. dates sold in western countries are almost dried, dates are been sold in the market in the dry state with lots of wrinkles on it & smooth surface dates. 

Due to these several health benefits dates have become quite popular in recent years. let's quickly check out the benefits of it:

details.full_description: Dates are high in calories as it is dried fruit, and dates contain several vitamins and minerals also contain some amount of protein and it has been considered as an excellent source of fiber.

It contains 7grams of fiber in a 3.5-ounce serving, if your body is lacking fiber then you can include it in your diet to increase your fiber intake. fiber helps in preventing constipation and controlling blood sugar levels.

Antioxidants help in protecting against free radicals which are unstable molecules that can cause a harmful reaction in your body and it becomes a reason for several diseases. Dates contain some important antioxidants such as flavonoids, carotenoids, phenolic acid.

Dates contain antioxidants like flavonoids which are known to reduce inflammation and prevent plaques from forming in the brain, which is very important for preventing your brain against Alzheimer's disease.

What's more, dates help in improving bone health and safeguard against diseases, also help in controlling blood sugar levels, and it works as a natural sweetener. Dates are a very healthy fruit that you can include in your diet. There are many different ways to add Dates in your diet.

title: Health benefits of Dates
